name: DAMAGE SHIELD Protective Conditioner
about: What it is:A conditioner that protects against damage from UV rays, environmental aggressors, and mechanical styling, while helping soften, detangle, and enhance shine..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.Key Benefits:- Protects hair from daily damage to help maintain hair health.Highlighted Ingredients:- Biotech-Produced Polysaccharide: Protects and shields hair from pollution and environmental aggressors..Ingredient Callouts:It is gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This conditioner helps prevent damage and maintain hair health while weightlessly nourishing and conditioning. It is pH-optimized to minimize excess cuticle swelling during washing and help prevent frizz, preserve color, and enhance shine. This formula is also made without film-forming silicones and waxes that can build up over time and weigh hair down..Fragrance Description:This conditioner has a clean citrus scent...Clinical Results:Results observed in a consumer test of 35 subjects after 1 day of usage of the K18 DAMAGE SHIELD protective conditioner:
ingredients: -Biotech-Produced Polysaccharide: Protects and shields hair from pollution and environmental aggressors..-Fortifying Ceramide Blend: Seals damage sites, smoothing and protecting hair from future damage..-K18PEPTIDE: Replenishes protein lost during washing to fortify hair...Water (Aqua) (Eau), Isopropyl Palmitate, Stearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Isopen1yldiol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Tocopherol, Tocopherylacerate, Sh-Oligopeptide-78,Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweer Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Phospholipids, Jojoba Esters, Calcium Gwconate, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropylu00adTrimonium Chloride, Ceramide Np, Phytosteryijisostearyijceiyij Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyquaternium-16, Stearalkonium Chloride, Isopropylalcohol, Bij1ylene Glycol, Gluconolactone, Phenoxyerhanol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Hydroxycitronellal...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing with the DAMAGE SHIELD pH Protective Shampoo (sold separately), squeeze out excess water. .-Apply a small amount of conditioner from mid-lengths to ends..-Rinse thoroughly..-For best damage repair and prevention results: Use the detox shampoo + K18 molecular repair leave-in mask (sold separately) weekly to repair damage, and use the DAMAGE SHIELD shampoo (sold separately) and conditioner on non-mask wash days, to help prevent additional damage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of those that people either love or hate, but surprisingly I don't seem to fall into either category. For me this is just a pleasant silicone-free conditioner that leaves my hair soft, conditioned and healthy. No buildup. No heaviness. Nice Citrus scent. However, it does make my hair become greasier - quicker than it was before I brought this into my routine. This is the only downside for me, other than the fact that it does nothing to tame frizz, and in fact makes it just a bit more noticeable. Nothing a squirt of hair serum can't fix. But at this price, that shouldn't be the case, and its performance shouldn't just be 'average', this should sparkle! Yet it doesn't, it's just a mediocre conditioner at best. I've used much more effective drug store alternatives.   ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. My scalp wasnu2019t oily, I wasnu2019t using other products, and I have a filter on my shower. Decided to try this and so far in love with it! My hair feels SO lightweight but extremely soft and healthy! Hoping this lasts and doesnu2019t start not working like other brands!
The conditioner has no moisturizing/detangling factor whatsoever. My hair is a rats nest after applying and rinsing and have noticed that it makes my hair greasier faster.

reviews.review_text: I didnt have necessarily high hopes for this product, but I gave it a go anyway. The shampoo and conditioner have a nice fresh scent and they arent overbearing. I was mainly surprised at how easy it was to brush my hair after using the two. A pretty surprising difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my hair feel so clean and light. I get a lot of scalp build up so it was nice to use a shampoo that made my scalp feel super clean! It didnu2019t feel harsh on my hair either. Overall, my hair feels so soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try the K18 Conditioner, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations in terms of repairing and protecting my hair. As someone with damaged and dyed hair, I am always on the lookout for products that can restore health and repair split ends and dryness. Lately my main concerns are dryness and hair strength because after getting over a cold I lost some hair. I also used the shampoo but I didnt feel like it was necessary to the routine. Upon application, the conditioner has a luxurious and creamy texture that instantly feels nourishing. It's easy to distribute through the hair, and a little goes a long way, making it a cost-effective option despite its price. The lightweight formula ensures that my hair doesn't feel weighed down or greasy after use. One of the most impressive aspects of K18 is its ability to reduce breakage and improve elasticity. After just a few uses, I noticed a significant reduction in split ends and a noticeable increase in the overall strength of my hair. My strands felt smoother, shinier, and more resilient! Thank you K18!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DAMAGE SHIELD pH protective shampoo and conditioner set by K18 has been a game changer for my hair. Not only does it smell amazing, but it has significantly improved hydration and restored my hair's health. I'm impressed with the noticeable difference in just a short time. Highly recommend for anyone looking to revive and protect their hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo and conditioner combo has SAVED my hair! I dyed my hair recently and have been struggling with dry, damaged hair. The shampoo is very gentle on my scalp and the conditioner helps to repair my ends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this conditioner! It doesnu2019t weigh my hair down and keeps my wavy hair from getting frizzy. It isnu2019t too heavy which I really need for my hair! It isnu2019t the most conditioning product ever, so itu2019s really great for my fine hair for when I want to curl it and give it a little more grit and hold. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the K18 Damage Shield protective conditioner with the matching shampoo. Both have a pleasant scent that is subtle and doesnu2019t seem to linger after washing. The conditioner feels rich and creamy, yet I still found that it was easy to work a small amount through my entire (very long) hair. Immediately after rinsing, my hair felt sleek and hydrated. Once my hair was dry, I did feel happy with how it looked. It seemed to look healthier and smoother and worked well with my natural waves, making them look less wild than their usual natural state. I would say that felt lightweight and did not weigh down my hair. I also really like that on top of being a nice conditioner, it also offers protection from heat, styling, and environmental factors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hairstylist used this on my last appointment and I loved it. Using it at home and my hair is getting so healthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I love the scent- sort of citrusy and fresh. I often worry that trying new shampoo/conditioners that my curl/wave pattern will fall flat, but that was not the case with this duo. My hair looked and felt amazing, and I am excited to see the results as I continue using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this conditioner most to those who have fine, oily hair.  Since it is free of silicones, it wonu2019t cause significant build up.  This means that it can be used multiple times throughout the week without having to rely on a clarifying solution.  It provides a light amount of moisture, which wonu2019t weigh down thinner strands.  However, for my thick, dry hair, I prefer a more hydrating conditioner.  After each shower, it didnu2019t leave my hair as soft and detangled as I want.  I do like the conditioneru2019s scent, which I would describe as a citrus herbal blend.  As someone who uses heated hair tools regularly, I appreciate that this product protects my hair from damage.  I found that after styling, this conditioner helps my hair look less frizzy than usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this product complimentary to try out and I have to say that it did exactly what my hair needed! After using the shampoo and conditioner, my hair was soft and weightless. It was flowing so nicely and was perfectly deranged

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the conditioner more than most brands but it unfortunately gave me dandruff. But to be fair it gave me less dandruff than most other brands. It did leave my hair soft and shiny. It also left less buildup of product than others. My hair was still frizzy but it was minimal. I would probably not purchase this product but only because my scalp is very sensitive and gets dandruff really easily. It would be a better fit for people without sensitive scalps. The scent was light and refreshing. And it did help with less tangles.

reviews.review_title: Softer hair and easier to detangle

reviews.review_title: A must have for now on!

reviews.review_text: I was SO excited to try the K18 Damage Shield Protective Shampoo and Conditioner. Iu2019d been using the Leave-In Molecular Repair Mask for several months, and notice a difference in my hair every time I do. For context, I have fine hair but itu2019s fairly thick, with a greasy irritable scalp and dry ends. I also dye my hair, but usually opt for air drying. The price point of the K18 products had caused me be slow to try them, but I was lucky to get this set free for review. Iu2019ve also found that I can use a very small amount of the products and still see results, which makes the cost easier to justify. The Damage Shield line is meant for daily use. The shampoo is gentle enough on hair and scalp to use for every wash but also effective at correcting existing damage. The conditioner helps shield hair from UV rays, damage from styling, and environmental factors (it claims to do so up to three days!). The protective element is hard to determine in a short period, but much like the repair mask some effects are immediately noticeable. My hair definitely feels softer when I use this duo and itu2019s easier to comb out of the shower without tangles. My hair is also less frizzy, both immediately after it dries and for the next couple days which means the hydration really lasts. It doesnu2019t help soothe my scalp but also doesnu2019t irritate it further. And the formula is light enough that it doesnu2019t weigh down my thin hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this conditioner free from k18 and Skeepers.  I use salon brands on my hair and this K18 has made an amazing change to my hair. I do use it with the coordinating shampoo. The reason it works so well is because of Biomimetics which is the practice of learning from and mimicking nature. Mimicking the natural structure of hair's keratin building blocks (amino acid sequences) the K18 bioactive peptide is recognized as natural by the hair, perfectly fitting in and reconnecting broken keratin chains. Whether I let it air dry or do a proper blowout it looks like I just left the salon. My long hair is shiny, smooth, tangle free and holds its curls and style to the next wash. I use this every Sunday so I have perfect hair for the week! HG!!
